recipe.name: Chocolate Custard Ice Cream Base
recipe.ingredients: 450 grams milk 225 grams cup heavy cream 4 egg yolks 165 grams sugar 35 grams cocoa powder 1 tablespoon vanilla extract 1/2 teaspoon salt 115 grams dark chocolate, broken in pieces

step.describe: Put milk, cream, egg yolks, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, and salt in bowl.
Add 115 grams dark chocolate, broken in pieces.
Refrigerate until chilled, then churn in your ice cream maker according to the manufacturer?s instructions.
